Package game.body.walkers.steplisteners

Class MobStepListener

java.lang.Object
game.body.walkers.steplisteners.MobStepListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
city.cs.engine.StepListener, MobStepListenerFrame, EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
AggressiveStepListener, PassiveStepListener
public abstract class MobStepListener extends Object implements MobStepListenerFrame
An abstract class serving as an internal facing API. It is used to implement the MobStepListenerFrame interface
Since:
03-03-2025
Author:
Alexander Smolowitz, alexander.smolowitz@city.ac.uk

    • getPlayerDirectionX

      protected abstract float getPlayerDirectionX(float mobX)
      Gets the direction in which the player is in as represented by a float value. The float value can then be inputted into Walker.startWalking(float).
      Parameters:
      mobX - the x position of the mob
      Returns:
      the direction of the player in the form of a float negative for left, positive for right
